OOC: For the record Kinger has told me Savior moved down to dodge although it 
is not in the post.  I will go with that anyway.  And Kinger, before you yell 
at me for not taking damage, all of this would happen because of the laws of 
physics.

::Amperion::
    His momentum carried him forward causing the shots to zoom past behind 
him.  This also brought his arm forward far enough to deflect Gabriel's sword 
with his arm blade.  He continued falling forward landing on something hard 
feet first and springing back up.  He lashes out with his left sword and arm 
blade at Savior and fires his optic lasers at Gabriel.
